website_summaries.verdict: The classic sport sandal features adjustable, 3-strap support including a toe loop and a buckle strap around the ankle.
pros: Great for hiking trips or camping since the soles provide great traction on slippery surfaces
cons: The 3 straps can be difficult to adjust and cause some tightness and discomfort around the big toe

customer_reviews.title: Worth your money; if youre a half size read this
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They're hard to adjust because they're 3 straps and when i got them they were too small so i returned them and i'm about to get new ones, but they're worth the money. You can wear them everywhere with any outfit since it matches with everything. They're good for trips and camps, etc. If you're a half size i recommend going up because if you go down its too perfect on your feet and if its swollen or anything, it wont fit. I'm a 6 1/2 and i tried a 7 on and it fits better than the 6, which i just returned. Hope this helped (:
customer_reviews.author: Ana jarrell

customer_reviews.title: Hard to figure out right size, but worth the trouble.
customer_reviews.text: Theses shoes are great! I had to send back 2 different orders because I couldn't figure out what size I needed. I normally wear an 8 but I couldn't get the straps tight enough around my heel. The 7 hit my arch wrong and caused a pain, so I ordered a 7 wide and it fits perfect. I have never ever needed a wide, I have a very skinny foot, but that's the size I need in these sandals. Glad I didn't give up, wish I could have gone to a store and tried them on, but now I know.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but tight around the toes
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute but you have to adjust the cords overtime you wear them. They are comfortable at first and then the cords shift and are too tight on my foot or either my big toe. I can't wear them long. I expected them to be very comfortable for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous color awesome fit!
customer_reviews.text: I was all set to send these beauties back because I felt bad about spending so much on a sandal. But I tried them on....straight out of the box they were perfect!! Oh my gosh the color is stunning I absolutely love the color. The fit was perfect, I didn't tug one strap, it was like they were made for my feet. I can't say enough good things about them! Worth the money for fit and gorgeous color, and my feet feel so great in them, like they are an old friend. My first pair of chaco sandals, and I know it won't be the last. These will not be returned because I won't take them off ! 😍
customer_reviews.author: cosmic jolt

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, but very restrictive
customer_reviews.text: Everyone said to order up if you wear a half size but i definitely wish I would have ordered down. I normally wear a 7.5 and I ordered an 8 and they are huge and uncomfortable because of it. I wore them briefly though while figuring this out so I couldn't return them. Also will not be getting Chacos with 3 straps again. It is really hard to get them adjusted right and to keep the toe loop from cutting off your circulation. So I have now paid a lot of money for shoes that I cannot wear. Definitely should have just bought them form the store instead of on here.
customer_reviews.author: Ash Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Blisters even after straps are adjusted
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this product for myself. After adjusting the straps I figured they were still too narrow. I decided to give them to my 14 years old who has a narrow foot and we had the straps adjusted to fit her. She went for a walked to the store and came back with blisters and she said she won’t be wearing them again. Shipping was fast. I wish I could return them since they’ll never be worn again but sadly they’ve been worn once for a couple of blocks. Seller is great and responds quickly when you have questions.
customer_reviews.author: SABRINA LOPEZ

customer_reviews.title: Ultra comfortable and versatile!
customer_reviews.text: Great, durable sandal. Stylish, yet very comfortable for walking. Dries easily and the materials hold up well when going from wet to dry repeatedly. The toe loop is adjustable which I didn't realize right away and thought I'd have to return them. With a little tug, the material feeds through the toe loop and adjusts easily for customized comfort. Love them!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful Soles
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get my Chacos and teynthem out. I heard they were great for people that need more support in their arches and honestly the arch support was nice! However, the soles were so hard it was like standing on concrete. I tried breaking them in but they never got any better. Itbfelt as if the soles were rubbing blisters on the bottom of my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe but not for long wear
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter, so I can only report on what she had to say about them after wearing them. This is a very cute shoe. They were bought for her to wear while kayaking. They have only been worn one time. After having them on for about 3-4 hours (in a kayak, not walking), they had worn sores onto her two big toes. It is where the strap goes around. This strap does not stretch, so it does not adjust to the movements of the foot. For the price that I paid for this pair of shoes, they should not have caused this discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Kristal

customer_reviews.title: Overall I really like them. The only thing I would have changed ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really like them. The only thing I would have changed is the sides that come up around the heel. They push into the sides of your heel and after a few hours start to hurt. The more I wear them the more my feet have become accustomed to them tho. Other than that I love them. They look great, feel great. I get a lot of compliments on them. I normally wear a size 8 1/2 and I purchased a 9 after reading the reviews and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: JayLee Harthun

customer_reviews.title: wrong product sent
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive the peach colored ZX3 classic sandal from Chacos, they fit relatively well compared to most other sandals. I have wide feet and the foot bed was wide enough but the style of the shoes was nothing like the description or photo. There was no toe loop and there were a limited number of straps on the sides, not the multiple straps as shown. I would have reordered if I were able confirm that this was a shipping mistake but the seller did not respond to my inquiry regarding the mistake so I have no choice but to return and find a different seller. :( rather disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Just couldn't talk myself into liking them.
customer_reviews.text: I tried so hard to like these sandals, especially after I'd paid that much for them, but I just never could get them to fit comfortably. They were super cute with shorts and capris, but I couldn't stand them for more than about an hour. As many other reviewer have stated, the strap around the big toe seems to be the culprit. I felt like my toe was in an ever-tightening noose, and soon my entire foot was sore from being held in an unnatural position.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Tightens on around the big toe
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the look of these shoes. The three strap is adorable and I love the blue pattern. Also, the foot support is good. However, I cannot get the straps to stop tightening themselves around my big toe and strangling it. I find myself bending down every few minutes to loosen my poor big toe. For that, the comfort does not at all match the cost. Maybe the Chacos without the toe strap are better, I'll wait till my budget can afford it to try again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: I love my chacos
customer_reviews.text: I love my chacos! These are my first pair. They are so comfortable and exactly what I wanted. At first I thought they weren't gonna fit because of my wife feet and fat toes but after following the instructions you are able to make them fit your feet perfectly by adjusting the straps
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Worst shoes I’ve ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt the most uncomfortable annoying piece of footwear I’ve ever come across. The criss cross design allows for adjustability but they tend to tighten and listen on your feet as you walk. My big toes inevitably become chokes off by the end of the day. The small straps look cute and add a daintiness that distracts from the sandal’s bulky sole, but because add them to the adjustable criss cross design and you’ve got an infuriating puzzle on your hands! I hate them and if I didn’t loose the box I would have returned them. Aweful, aweful shoes that just frustrate me every time I look at them!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Toe loop is a problem. Size is big.
customer_reviews.text: The loop around my toe ratchets down as I walk. There is no way to fix it, as I can see. Also, I wear 8.5 - 9, but the 9 is too big. I can still wear them because they are sandals, just too long at the toe. I bought an 8 in the black with no toe loop, and they are a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Possi

customer_reviews.title: Ordered a wide instead of size up and fit perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a wide instead of size up and fit perfect!!! Use wide to your normal size or will be small and tight
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe... but ran big for sure
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter. Had to return the first one I bought for a size smaller. Usually she would be an 8 in sandals... but in these the 7 was the best fit-- These took a little break-in time, but once she lived through wearing them for a couple weeks-- they became very comfy and she loves them now. We had read about this break-in period so expected it-- and it's true! But worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Tony722

customer_reviews.title: A NIGHTMARE TO ADJUST. SENT THEM BACK.
customer_reviews.text: OMG these shoes are a nightmare to adjust. After 1 & 1/2 hours of fiddling around and even watching the video, I just could not make it work. I got the fit okay but kept ending up with excess strap material at the back. I pretty much gave up even though it looked like I was doing everything correctly. These shoes are also very heavy. I really tried but nothing should take this long.
customer_reviews.author: R Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good show, cute, but constantly adjusting straps...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for an upcoming vacation, I typically wear a 6.5-7 and have slightly narrow feet, I ordered a 7 and they fit well, the arch is a little high for my flat feet so it took wearing hem around the house to get used to similar to birkenstocks, the straps are fully adjustable, however as I walk around the straps tighten up around my toe I find that loosening around the toe ALOT makes it more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: BuyerE

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but clunky
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear an 8, but maybe should have bought a 7. The foot bed is big and the straps have to be so tight that they dangle off the side. I have to fold them up so they dont drag. I like these shoes, but they're a bit clunky. I need something more petite. Cant return since I've already worn them, but may look for something lighter next time. They do seem well made, though.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Daniel

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE SHOES
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes to do lots of walking in on uneven terrain and in water. They are wonderful!!! They dry off quickly and do not cause any irritating spots on my feet. It took a little work to initially figure out how to adjust the straps even though they provide a diagram. Once I got it though, they are great. I love the arch support that they provide. They keep my feet from hurting AT ALL. I would def recommend them to anyone. Especially if you need additional foot support.
customer_reviews.author: Alecia B.

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are cold blooded
customer_reviews.text: These are the weirdest, most uncomfortable shoes ever. I wore them for several days hoping I'd get used to them and/or break them in. No such luck. They've just felt awful. Completely bummed to he stuck with expensive shoes that squeeze my feet at random in weird places
customer_reviews.author: Rowan & Graham

customer_reviews.title: Toe strap too tight
customer_reviews.text: Not ideal for people with a large big toe, no matter how many times I adjusted it would keep getting tight to my foot. I loved the rest of the shoe, good support and good quality. I'll be returning these and getting the chacos without the toe strap. (Don't mind my unpolished toe)
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: wore them a few times and while still not my favorite looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Thought they were ugly when I first got them.. wore them a few times and while still not my favorite looking shoe, I take them everywhere. They are first choice when I go hiking and rock climbing as well as boating. Next time I may get the style without the toe loop.
customer_reviews.author: GypsyMermaid14

customer_reviews.title: They are swell.
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed in the quality of these fine sandals. Not only do they provide support for my feet, but they have impacted my life in ways I never would have expected. They've given me a new sense of purpose and help me fit into the "cool crowd" of the younger generations. I can now get wicked striped tan lines on my feet to show off at the pool with my grandkids.
customer_reviews.author: Katy Warnke

customer_reviews.title: Service and shipping were great, BUT I could not get those shoes from ...
customer_reviews.text: Service and shipping were great, BUT I could not get those shoes from trying to squeeze my big toe off.....really uncomfortable..such a shame because they were too cute.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: for three months and they have been a wonderful investment. I had never owned a pair of ...
customer_reviews.text: I've worn these sandals, almost exclusively, for three months and they have been a wonderful investment. I had never owned a pair of Chacos before, so it took a bit to figure out the best tightness of straps, but that was the only issue I really encountered. I've found these shoes very comfortable for work, travel (I work in Iowa and the Caribbean - very versatile), and even wore them to an outdoor wedding. Receive a lot of compliments on these shoes, and even more compliments on the tan lines ; )
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of Chacos and I’m not as thrilled as the reviews hype them up to be so good. The left one I cannot seem to ever get tight enough so feels too loose. The toe straps tighten way too much while wearing and the excess straps either drag or I have to tuck them in the back somehow. Every time I wear them it takes me 10 minutes to adjust them. I won’t buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: J.Dix

customer_reviews.title: Straps don’t move after one hike
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give these sandals a zero star. As you can see from the photos they look brand new. I wore them a total of 5-7 times. The straps don’t move at all. They barely move with pliers. I have followed all the re-Chaco instructions like washing, the fabric softener and pliers trick to get the straps moving again and they don’t budge. Amazon wouldn’t exchange these for me after I contacted them right after using them for the first time. Majorly disappointed all around.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Brenneman

customer_reviews.title: Not for the tender foot.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sturdy. Hard rubber sole. Wide fit as advertised. I needed half sizes. This is NOT a soft, comfortable, cushy or easy to wear sandal. I read up and they are recommended for people needing arch support. Which I do. I am stubborn. I bought them and am stuck with them. Even though, they are killing my feet#!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Griffith-Smith

customer_reviews.title: By far the best invest in sandals!
customer_reviews.text: These definitely take some getting use to but I took the advice from others and wore them around the house, adjusted them until they fit just right and once they were broke in they are my go to sandals only. I am so glad I own a pair! We do a lot of outdoors camping and site seeing and traveling and I was sick of flip flops but didn’t want the look of other outdoor foot wear and these are just perfect! Will be ordering more colors from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend these sandals to anyone wanting a great sandal. They are cute and are ok sandals, but the straps always twist and they rub my feet to blister every time I try to wear them for any amount of time. I regret buying these but I'm out of my return window :(
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Finally, sandals for sore feet
customer_reviews.text: I have narrow feet and extremely high arch and a raging case of plantar fasciitis. These sandals have really good support and are comfortable. Would I wear them all day? With healthy feet I imagine I would! I love the colors (turquoise). I bought my usual size (8); the adjustable strap keeps them on just fine.
customer_reviews.author: SJG

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR TOES! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! Was so excited to get these shoes after reading how comfortable they are supposed to be. Have tried to readjust them everyday for almost a month to get them to fit around my big toe without eventually cutting off blood supply but have finally given up. This is stupid. I will never buy chacos again.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan ojeda

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love My Chacos!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love my Chacos!!!! These sandals look and fit great! I have added this pair to the many other pairs of Chacos that I have. The foot bed is amazing and supports my feet so well. I hate when winter comes and I have to wear regular shoes.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, my big toes feel like they’re in a Chinese finger trap. I’ve just been able to adjust it so it doesn’t feel like my toes are being squeezed to death, but even then it feels uncomfortable sometimes. Other than that, they’re okay. Sometimes I wish there was more cushion in the sole but it’s hard. I’m usually a 7.5 or 8. I originally ordered the 8 but that was way too big. So I ordered the 7 and they fit better, but there’s still some extra space by the toes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Try on the shoe before ordering.. if possible!
customer_reviews.text: Chacos are not the best for wide feet, I myself have skinny feet so it worked out! The shoes are great, as for sizing I would definitely recommend trying the shoe on in person first. The size does vary based on how you personally would like the sandal to fit! (Loose or tight - More room the in the toe area) stuff like that. The shoe itself is VERY comfortable if you are someone who finds comfort in firmer shoes. For example— Birkenstock’s. I wear these when I know I’m going to be on my feet all day in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: I love the look of these sandals
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these sandals, however, they are not very comfortable. The straps are not elastic at all and although you can adjust them just a little they really hurt the top of my feet and big toes after a couple of hours. I don't have a big or wide feet, I am a pretty standard 8 1/2 of regular width and I ordered a #9 . So, I don't understand why these sandals are way too tight. The straps also feel a little like sandpaper.
customer_reviews.author: L. B. D'Alba

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes. They a super comfortable and they stay on your feet. The grips on the bottom make it easy to avoid slipping when climbing around. They're a great all around shoe and I would suggest everyone own a pair
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe and best price
customer_reviews.text: Went to local shop to see price and try on. Found on Amazon for cheaper. Best price is the name of the game guys. Sorry local companies...i hate it but we are poor people trying to eek out a living.
customer_reviews.author: JDL

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, love chacos.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I just have very narrow feet but these were pretty bulky. My last pair were a size 5 and the straps were very tight but width was good. but with a size up the width was very wide and straps were a lot bigger. Not sure what size to do I wish they had a 5.5
customer_reviews.author: Chloe colello

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hiking in warm weather and wet conditions
customer_reviews.text: I used these shoes for a trip where we did a lot of hiking. We were going to be in some wet areas, so I wanted shoes that would dry quickly. These were perfect! Unlike other outdoor sandals I have worn, they were not easy to trip in. The soles had good traction for walking over wet rocks, and were thick enough to protect my feet.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Nice arch support
customer_reviews.text: The straps will not stay adjusted to my feet. They gradually get too tight around my toes. I constantly need to readjust the straps. Nice arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ADORABLE but heavy..
customer_reviews.text: The shoe itself is super cute and pretty comfortable. However, they are pretty heavy on my feet... making it slightly less comfortable. I hear the "cloud" version of these shoes are much lighter. Next time I am in need of sandals again I will be trying those out instead! These were delivered on time and the straps are adjustable!
customer_reviews.author: s h a n o n

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time purchasing chacos, so I went in blind! And I couldn’t be happier!! They’re so cute and fit perfectly! I read previous reviews and they said to buy them a few months in advance to break them in and I’m so glad I did! They are a hard sandal but so comfy!! I can’t wait to wear them on our cruise! I usually wear a 5-5.5 and I bought a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Still tweaking
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been able to wear them much yet, and I am still tweaking the strap adjustment. So far they are a little tight, and my arch hurts some a little while after wearing. Hoping it's just getting used to them. I love the way they look. A little darker green than I was expecting, the picture looks more teal and it's really a green. Thinking I may need one size smaller, but scared the straps will be way too tight, as I have a fatter foot.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Garner

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I have always had Birks and will continue to wear my Birks. But these are great for a rainy day or early morning on the ball field with my daughter. I am still getting used to the continues straps can't seem to find the perfect spot yet, but I am sure that I will eventually.
customer_reviews.author: LynMarie

customer_reviews.title: These sandals are amazing! I'm able to walk all day in them ...
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from Plantar Fasciitis. These sandals are amazing! I'm able to walk all day in them without pain or exhaustion! I was hoping the profile of the sole wasn't quite so thick, but it doesn't deter me from wearing them at the river and the farm! I was so pleased with the comfort level of the shoes that I bought another pair. ZVOLV X2. I love those as well. I wear a 7.5 to 8 in most shoes. I ordered the 8M and they fit perfectly. The straps took me a while to get adjusted just right. Well worth the effort!!! Chaco customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: Corrie Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for any terrain
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 10 & ordered a size up. The fit was perfect. This shoe was the best purchase I could have made for the cruise we went on. They are mult purposeful, they can be worn on land, on sand, in the water & hold their fit. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: amanda williams

customer_reviews.title: Was looking for a comfortable walking sandle
customer_reviews.text: I have nerve pain in my feet from prior surgeries. Was looking for a comfortable walking sandle. These work great. No pain.
customer_reviews.author: mpj1138

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandal
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of Chacos. There was a bit of adjustment getting used to an arch that is higher than I’m used to, but it didn’t take long. Love these as much as my keens.
customer_reviews.author: momofmytwins

customer_reviews.title: I am not a large person but I need good sandals for arch support
customer_reviews.text: I bought the wide width sandals but it is still too narrow for my feet. I am not a large person but I need good sandals for arch support. The spot where the harness is on both sides of the heel are pushing into my feet. No relief or give to them. I have to wear some sort of padding to be able to wear them. I really like the Chaco's but am thinking that I will never be able to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great shoes and great adventures
customer_reviews.text: perfect shoes for all walking/ hiking occasions. i am a chaco fanatic and these shoes fit the bill. they are comfy and fitting. the triple strap is cute and functional. i love these shoes and they have accompanied me on all of my adventures :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute sandal
customer_reviews.text: I have grown to love these. I have never won a pair of Chakos before and at first it was really different near the arches and they made my feet hurt I did get used to them and now they’re my favorite shoes
customer_reviews.author: J. Read

customer_reviews.title: Wide feet beware
customer_reviews.text: Wide footed feline? It will be quit snug. Just a warning. My daughter has a wide foot and has commented several times she wished she bought the wide ones. But the quality of these is worth the price. We don't mind paying premium prices for premium products, these fit the premium categorie on both fronts.
customer_reviews.author: All Computer Services

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: These are uber comfy. I'm planning on wearing these to a trip to Belize this summer so I'm breaking them in now. Its going to take a few wearings to break them in but I'm liking what I'm seeing. They seem to be made with a good quality, they have good arch support, and they fit well on top of my foot. It is really hard for me to find sandals that fit the top of my wide feet. These are really working for me and I'm glad I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Bossler

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are very tight
customer_reviews.text: Having said that they loosen up with wear....and, they are very comfortable once they loosen up. Seem sturdy and great arch support. But, I think I am going back to my super comfy and sturdy Tevas.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna

customer_reviews.title: Get them!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always wanted to try a pair of Chacos and I finally took the leap and got them. And let me tell you, I’m so NOT disappointed. They’re great and super comfortable. The straps are adjustable and they fit around my feet perfectly after some tweaking to it They also came through the mail super fast. I’ll most def buy another pair in another color!
customer_reviews.author: Han

customer_reviews.title: Cute but super uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and sooo uncomfortable. If you have planters fasciitis they are a nightmare. I bought them for our trip to Moab and I couldn’t wear them. They killed my feet. The soles are so hard and the arch is too high. I had to return them. I’ll stick with my sketchers sandals that have a soft comfortable sole.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Peay

customer_reviews.title: Love me some chacos
customer_reviews.text: It took me a little while to get used to the strap adjustments. but once that came together I have no complaints. I wore them daily for the rest of the summer and loved them. Went hiking, swimming, running with my dog a little. They do it all. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Anna N.

customer_reviews.title: Not durable at all
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart after six months of hiking. That was for the strap to break. The sole of the sandal came apart in just 3 months. Thought the Chaco brand was supposed to last for years and years. Will be purchasing another brand this time around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these and the are good if u suffer heelspurs
customer_reviews.text: Love these and the are good if u suffer heelspurs. I normally wear 6.5 but got a 6 in these and the fit was perfect. This is my 3rd pair and would buy again. Arrived on time and well packaged
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes
customer_reviews.text: I expected these to be more comfortable, maybe after a break in period I will have a better review. They are very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals---they have lots of support. Normally I wear tennis shoes with custom arch supports and I can wear these without any painful adjustments. They are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Good

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not comfortable, hard to fit the straps every time you put them on. Not the normal Chaco
customer_reviews.author: KCS75

customer_reviews.title: I am usually a size 7 in tennis shoe, ...
customer_reviews.text: I am usually a size 7 in tennis shoe, so I originally ordered a 7, they didnt fit. So then i ordered a 6, still too big and not wide enough.
customer_reviews.author: Lexy McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. I wore them on a hiking trip and a tubing trip and they were perfect. They were a little tight around my big toes but seemed to break in after the first few days.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Smith

customer_reviews.title: Chacos didn't disappoint - by far my favorite shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I wore them nearly every day this summer. The white has gotten dirty but it just shows my love for them. That and the permanent criss-cross tan I've been sporting for 8 months now. Great sturdy, comfortable shoes that you can do almost anything in.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: If you have wide feet, don’t order these
customer_reviews.text: I was bummed how narrow these are. The toe is extremely tight! I do have wide feet tho! You can adjust them to be somewhat comfortable but with all the straps it takes forever. Kind of annoying. If you have wider feet I wouldn’t get this style!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Leona

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoes but took a little getting used to but they are great for walking/hiking in the woods.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: I ordered up a size and the fit great! I usually get a size up in sandals though.
customer_reviews.text: These look great! Very comfortable and had great arch support. We had a little trouble adjusting the straps to fit just right, but with a little work we got them adjusted. These are not easily “slipped on”, some effort is required do slide you feet in and get the straps situated.
customer_reviews.author: abpalmer

customer_reviews.title: Fit right, look good, and well built
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend is loving these shoes. They are well built and fit for daily use and to explore! The fit was exactly as expected for her shoe size. Though the price is on the high end, they a seem to be well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: James Jones

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove, and I love it. I wear a 7.5 in most shoes, but needed a 7 in this sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Chaco sandals
customer_reviews.text: Nice made sandals. Bought for grand daughter for graduation gift. Didn't realize the straps were to be adjusted until we saw instructions inside box. It took a little time to get straps adjusted to fit correctly. Cool how the the strap system works. She loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: If you have narrow half size feet, go a size down.
customer_reviews.text: I have narrow feet and usually wear a 7.5. I got the 8 because all the reviews I read said you could just tighten the straps, but that didn't work for me since the heel strap can't be tightened. If I move my foot all the way back so the heel strap fits there is a big space between my toes and the end of the shoe. I am returning for a size 7. Hopefully those fit better since I am wanting to wear them for my trip to Europe in a few days. I love the shoes other than the sizing issue... they are cute and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelci

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding as ususal
customer_reviews.text: These are great as are all Chaco's. However the triple strapping that looks cool does take a longer to get on.
customer_reviews.author: Pappas

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes to use while hiking and for waterfalls. They worked great for that and they are really cute! However I’ve only had them 3 months and with only random weekend use they have already started tearing up. This is my first pair of chacos so not sure if it’s a brand issue or just this specific pair, but personally I feel like they should have lasted longer for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sara W.

customer_reviews.title: Look exactly like the picture!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are wonderful and are relatively true to size. I love them and they’re so so cute. I think my toes are just fatter than most peoples and that’s why I’m struggling to fit them in the toe strap. Still love them so much. If you know your foot is a little wider or your toes are porky then maybe get a size up!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren King

customer_reviews.title: Adore these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals! They fit perfectly thanks to my ability to read other reviews to see how they run. I have worn them several times without any rubbed spots on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: C. Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love them. I have a really skinny feet so they did fit me a little big but they’re perfect
customer_reviews.author: Livelifenaomi

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love Chacos bc of chacos 😂 they are so confortable for outdoor activities such as long walks or something that has to do with water // super cutes! 👌🏻♥️ But this version of sandals comes small so be careful when you order I’m usually 5 and I should have ordered 6 bc they were too smal
customer_reviews.author: STEPHANIE

customer_reviews.title: Bad design. 3 straps not the way to go.
customer_reviews.text: I ended up giving them away because the straps around the big toe would continue tightening all day as I walked until they were uncomfortable. My daughter tried them as well and had the same problem. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Creeking Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome for going hiking and walking in the river or in the beach. They dry out really fast and give you lots of arch support. I would recommend going and trying them on somewhere befor you buy them. I usually wear a 10 in my running shoes and I wear the 9 in Chacos and I still have plenty of room to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: These are not true to size to even better describe it one fits great the other is to tight so they aren’t even a pair this is rediculis I bought these for a trip
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: I am on my 3rd pair of chacos, and ...
customer_reviews.text: I am on my 3rd pair of chacos, and not because they have worn out! These feel a little bit shorter than my last pair but definitely wouldn't have gone up in size either.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: High arch uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The arch is extremely high. Hoping they might break in and be more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Toresa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! The colors are great and they are super comfortable. I am a flip flop/no shoes person so it took a little while to get used to having your feet strapped it, but now that I'm used to them there is no looking back! I originally purchased these for a trip overseas in January, but I've already started wearing them everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved them
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughters 2nd pair of Chaco's - while I don't see the appeal - she loves them and wears them every single day until it gets cold! This supplier was resonable - had many styles to choose from and shpped quickly - will buy again from this supplier!
customer_reviews.author: Cher K.

customer_reviews.title: Slightly tight
customer_reviews.text: The main reason it's a 3 is because I don't have think feet at all but these felt real tight and the loops get rolled. Not as excited about them as I thought I would be
customer_reviews.author: Christina Miller

customer_reviews.title: Always satisfied with Chaco!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very much a fan of Chaco Sandals!! I love how comfortable they are !! I could wear them all day!! I ordered 2 pair.. and love both of them !! Thank you Spanky
customer_reviews.author: Pam Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 7.5 I got an 8 and there a little big but but I would rather them fit a little big then small! Love them there comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Works great when using on hikes or in water
customer_reviews.text: Works great when using on hikes or in water. Used them while snorkeling and worked great! Straps were a little tighter than expected and a lot harder to manage slipping in and out of them. Also when tightening or loosening straps.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine P.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandles. They look great and are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Wright

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, a little hard to figure out the straps
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, a little hard to figure out the straps. Well worth it. I wear a 7.5 and ended up with a 7. Fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Holding up well after a whole year of many miles. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Believer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Arrived when they were scheduled to arrive. Very comfortable and I know I am going to enjoy them this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ouch.
customer_reviews.text: I have to adjust these each time I wear them or they will strangle my big toe. It's tricky to adjust it just right due to the three small straps. I should have opted for the less-cute single or double strap style. The colors are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: RoRose

customer_reviews.title: Given as a Gift
customer_reviews.text: Gift - was excited to receive and no complaints heard back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: these sandals are great but they should come with instructions
customer_reviews.text: these sandals are great but they should come with instructions. I didn't realize how much you can customize the straps. I thought I hated them initially​ because they were choking out my big toe then I finally realized the straps are a continuous loop. Once I looked up a youtube video teaching me how to fit them they were awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

product_meta.title: Chaco Women's ZX3 Classic Sport Sandal
product_meta.description:
Streamlined and dependable since 1989, our Classic series is comprised of only 8 component parts, making for the simple, timeless sandal design that made our name. Every pair of ZX/3 sandals comes standard with adjustable triple-straps that custom-fits to your foot, a toe-loop for additional forefoot control, plus our podiatrist-certified LUVSEAT PU footbed for all-day comfort and support. Now featuring ChacoGrip rubber for our best performing Classic outsole to date. Experience our Classic Sandal like never before.

Since 1989, Chaco has been creating great fitting product that outlast the competition - footwear that can be repaired rather than pitched into a landfill. Chaco focuses on fit, function, comfort and quality with a full line of footwear, including hiking and river sandals, free-heel casual sandals, flips and new for 2007 a children's collection. All Chaco footwear features a biocentric footbed and has received the APMA Seal of Acceptance. Chaco maintains a triple bottom line of people, planet and profit, donating 3% of after-tax profits to organizations dedicated to caring for people and the planet.
feature_bullets: Polyester jacquard webbing and rubber compound
Triple-strapped polyester jacquard webbing upper wraps around the foot and through the midsole for a customized fit, Injection-molded ladder lock buckle
Adjustable and durable high-tensile webbing heel risers
Women's specific LUVSEAT PU midsole, Antimicrobial application for odor control
Non-marking ChacoGrip rubber compound, 3mm lug depth in Outsole
